sqlMap.select:
SELECT CLOCK as "clock", ITEMCODE as "itemcode", MONITORID as "monitorid", a.FACTORID as "factorid", b.FACTORNAME AS "factorname", COMPUTERMODE as "computermode", ISTOTAL as "istotal", ISTAX as "istax", LIMIT as "limit", EQUIVALUE as "equivalue", taxsourcecode as "taxsourcecode", unittax as "unittax" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HD_TAXANDTOTAL_DETAIL a LEFT JOIN ${hbSchema}.T_HA_FACTOR b ON a.factorid=b.factorid WHERE 1=1
CLOCK = #clock#
ITEMCODE = #itemcode#
MONITORID = #monitorid#
a.FACTORID = #factorid#
$orderBy$
a.FACTORID asc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HD_TAXANDTOTAL_DETAIL WHERE 1=1
CLOCK = #clock#
ITEMCODE = #itemcode#
MONITORID = #monitorid#
FACTORID = #factorid#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ${hbSchema}.T_HD_TAXANDTOTAL_DETAIL (CLOCK, ITEMCODE, MONITORID, FACTORID, COMPUTERMODE, ISTOTAL, ISTAX, LIMIT, EQUIVALUE, taxsourcecode , unittax ) VALUES (#clock:VARCHAR#, #itemcode:VARCHAR#, #monitorid:VARCHAR#, #factorid:VARCHAR#, #computermode:VARCHAR#, #istotal:VARCHAR#, #istax:VARCHAR#, #limit:VARCHAR#, #equivalue:VARCHAR#, #taxsourcecode:VARCHAR#, #unittax:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HD_TAXANDTOTAL_DETAIL WHERE CLOCK = #clock# AND ITEMCODE = #itemcode# AND MONITORID = #monitorid# AND FACTORID = #factorid#
DELETE FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HD_TAXANDTOTAL_EXPRESS WHERE 1=1 and clock = #clock# and itemcode = #itemcode# and monitorid = #monitorid# and factorid = #factorid#
DELETE FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HD_TAXANDTOTAL_EXPRESS WHERE 1=1 and clock like '%$year$%' and itemcode = #itemcode#
DELETE FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HD_TAXANDTOTAL_DETAIL WHERE 1=1 and clock like '%$year$%' and itemcode = #itemcode#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HD_TAXANDTOTAL_DETAIL SET COMPUTERMODE = #computermode#, ISTOTAL = #istotal#, ISTAX = #istax#, LIMIT = #limit#, EQUIVALUE = #equivalue#, taxsourcecode = #taxsourcecode#, unittax = #unittax# WHERE CLOCK = #clock# AND ITEMCODE = #itemcode# AND MONITORID = #monitorid# AND FACTORID = #factorid#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT distinct a.FACTORID AS "factorid", b.FACTORNAME AS "factorname", a.highlimit as "limit" FROM t_ha_portfactor a left join t_ha_factor b on(a.factorid=b.factorid) WHERE 1=1
a.FACTORID = #factorid#
a.portid = #portid#
a.monitorid = #monitorid#
$orderBy$
a.FACTORID asc
